torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with a Gardevoir's porcelain skin. A large horn juts out from the middle of [npc.her] torso.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] Gardevoir, [npc.skinFullDescription]. A large horn juts out from the middle of [npc.her] torso.
